title: (x) Roy Arden sans serif caps - Ministry {John Lyttle}
content:
this is beautiful. what is it?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202122518im_/http:/typophile.com/files/PP4-3_5029.jpg)
author: fredcastle

comments.content: Could it be [Ministry](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202122518/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/device/ministry/medium/) by Rian Hughes? Not to be confused with [MinistryScript](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202122518/http:/www.sudtipos.com/fonts/34) by Alejandro Paul. It would be fun to see them on the same page, though.
